overview: The battles that marked the world are individually highlighted: the Trojan Wars and the Roman battles, we come through the Crusades and the 80-year war in the more recent history correctly.  Crucial moments in war history are reviewed: the French Revolution and Napoleon, the American Civil War, we end up gradually in the 20th century with the 1st and 2nd World War as a bloody highlights.
title: Historische Oorlogen
